words.id: sesungguhnya Kami||Kami bukakan/beri kemenangan||bagi kamu||pembukaan/kemenangan||nyata
words.en: Indeed||We have given victory||to you||a victory||clear

translations.text: innaa fatahnaa laka Fatham Mubeenaa

words.id: untuk memberi ampunan||bagimu||Allah||apa yang||telah lalu||dari||dosa-dosamu||dan apa yang||akan datang||dan Dia menyempurnakan||nikmat-Nya||atas kamu||dan Dia memberi petunjuk kepadamu||jalan||lurus
words.en: That may forgive||for you||Allah||what||preceded||of||your fault||and what||will follow||and complete||His favor||upon you||and guide you||(to) a Path||Straight

translations.text: Liyaghfira lakal laahu maa taqaddama min zanbika Wa-maa ta-akhkhara Wa-yutimma ni'matahoo alaika Wa-yahdiyaka siraatan mustaqeema

words.id: dan akan menolong kamu||Allah||pertolongan||kuat
words.en: And Allah may help you||And Allah may help you||(with) a help||mighty

translations.text: Wa-yansurakal laahu nasran 'azeezaa

words.id: Dia||yang||menurunkan||ketenteraman||dalam||hati||orang-orang yang beriman||supaya mereka bertambah||keimanan||beserta||keimanan mereka||dan kepunyaan Allah||bala tentara||langit(jamak)||dan bumi||dan adalah||Allah||Maha Mengetahui||Maha Bijaksana
words.en: He||(is) the One Who||sent down||[the] tranquility||in(to)||(the) hearts||(of) the believers||that they may increase||(in) faith||with||their faith||And for Allah||(are the) hosts||(of) the heavens||and the earth||and Allah||and Allah||(is) All-Knower||All-Wise

translations.text: Huwal lazeee anzalas sakeenata fee quloobil mu'mineena liyazdaadooo eemaanam ma'a eemaanihim; Wa-lillaahi junoodus samawaati wal-ard; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Aleeman Hakeemaa

words.id: Karena Dia hendak memasukkan||orang-orang mukmin laki-laki||dan orang-orang mukmin perempuan||surga||mengalir||dari||bawahnya||sungai-sungai||mereka kekal||didalamnya||dan Dia hendak menghapus||dari mereka||kesalahan mereka||dan adalah||demikian itu||di sisi||Allah||keuntungan||besar
words.en: That He may admit||the believing men||and the believing women||(to) Gardens||flow||from||underneath them||the rivers||(to) abide forever||therein||and (to) remove||from them||their misdeeds||and is||that||with||Allah||a success||great

translations.text: Liyudkhilal mu'mineena walmu'minaati jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru khaalideena feehaa Wa-yukaffira 'anhum saiyyi-aatihim; Wa-kaana zaalika indal laahi fawzan 'azeemaa

words.id: dan Dia hendak mengazab||orang-orang munafik laki-laki||dan orang-orang munafik perempuan||dan orang-orang musyrik laki-laki||dan orang-orang musyrik perempuan||mereka berperasangka||terhadap Allah||sangkaan||buruk||atas mereka||giliran||buruk||dan murka||Allah||atas mereka||dan Dia mengutuk mereka||dan Dia menyediakan||bagi mereka||neraka jahanam||dan amat buruk||tempat kembali
words.en: And He (may) punish||the hypocrite men||and the hypocrite women||and the polytheist men||and the polytheist women||who assume||about Allah||an assumption||evil||Upon them||(is) a turn||(of) evil||And (Allah's) wrath||(And) Allah's (wrath)||upon them||and He has cursed them||and prepared||for them||Hell||and evil||(is the) destination

translations.text: Wa-yu'azzibal munaafiqeena walmunaafiqaati wal-mushrikeena walmushrikaatiz zaaanneena billaahi zannas saw'; alaihim daaa'iratus saw'i Wa-ghadibal laahu alaihim Wa-la'anahum Wa-a'adda lahum jahannama Wa-saaa-at maseeraa

words.en: And for Allah||(are the) hosts||(of) the heavens||and the earth||and Allah||and Allah||(is) All-Mighty||All-Wise

translations.text: Wa-lillaahi junoodus samaawaati wal-ard; Wa-kaanal laahu 'azeezan hakeema

words.id: sesungguhnya Kami||Kami mengutus kamu||sebagai saksi||dan pembawa kabar gembira||dan pemberi peringatan
words.en: Indeed We||[We] have sent you||(as) a witness||and (as) a bearer of glad tidings||and (as) a warner

translations.text: innaaa arsalnaaka shaahi-danw Wa-mubashshiranw Wa-nazeera

words.id: supaya kamu beriman||kepada Allah||dan kepada rasul-Nya||dan kamu meneguhkan-Nya||dan kamu memuliakan-Nya||dan kamu bertasbih kepada-Nya||di waktu pagi||dan petang
words.en: That you may believe||in Allah||and His Messenger||and (may) honor him||and respect him||and glorify Him||morning||and evening

translations.text: Litu-minoo billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee Wa-tu'azziroohu watuwaqqiroohu watusabbi-hoohu bukratanw Wa-aseelaa

translations.text: innal lazeena yubaayi'oonaka innamaa yubaayi'oonal laaha yadul laahi fawqa aydeehim; faman nakasa fainnamaa yankusu 'alaa nafsihee Wa-man awfaa bimaa 'aahada alaihul laaha fasayu'teehi ajran 'azeemaa

words.en: Will say||to you||those who remained behind||of||the Bedouins||Kept us busy||our properties||and our families||so ask forgiveness||for us||They say||with their tongues||what||is not||in||their hearts||Say||Then who||has power||for you||against||Allah||(in) anything||if||He intends||for you||harm||or||He intends||for you||a benefit||Nay||is||Allah||of what||you do||All-Aware

translations.text: Sa-yaqoolu lakal mukhal-lafoona minal A'raabi shaighalatnaaa amwaalunaa Wa-ahloonaa fastaghfir lanaa; yaqooloona bi-alsinatihim maa laisa fee quloobihim; qul famaien yamliku lakum minal laahi shai'an in araada bikum darran aw araada bikum naf'aa; bal kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Khabeeraa

translations.text: Bal zanantum al laien yanqalibar Rasoolu walmu'minoona ilaaa ahleehim abadanw Wa-zuyyina zaalika fee quloobikum Wa-zanantum zannnas saw'i Wa-kuntum qawmam booraa

words.en: And whoever||(has) not believed||(has) not believed||in Allah||and His Messenger||then indeed, We||[We] have prepared||for the disbelievers||a Blazing Fire

translations.text: Wa-mal lam yu'mim billaahi Wa-Rasoolihee fainnaaa a'tadnaa lilkaafireena sa'eeraa

translations.text: Wa-lillaahii mulkus samaawaati wal-ard; yaghfiru limaien yashaaa'u Wa-yu'azzibu maien yashaaa'; Wa-kaanal laahu Ghafoorar Raheemaa

translations.text: Sa-yaqoolul mukhalla-foona izan talaqtum ilaa maghaanima litaakhuzoohaa zaroonaa nattabi'kum yureedoona any yubaddiloo Kalaamal laah; qul lan tattabi'oonaa kazaalikum qaalal laahu min qablu fasayaqooloona bal tahsudoonanna; bal kaanoo laa yafqahoona illaa qaleela

translations.text: Qul lilmukhallafeena minal A'raabi satud'awna ilaa qawmin ulee baasin shadeedin tuqaati-loonahum aw yuslimoona fa-in tutee'oo yu'tikumul laahu ajran hasananw Wa-in tatawallaw kamaa tawallaitum min qablu yu'azzibkum 'azaaban aleemaa

words.en: Not is||upon||the blind||any blame||and not||on||the lame||any blame||and not||on||the sick||any blame||And whoever||obeys||Allah||and His Messenger||He will admit him||(to) Gardens||flow||from||underneath them||the rivers||but whoever||turns away||He will punish him||(with) a punishment||painful

translations.text: Laisa 'alal a'maa harajunw Wa-laa 'alal a'raji harajunw Wa-laa 'alal mareedi haraj' Wa-maien yutil'il laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo yudkhilhu jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaaru Wa-maien yatawalla yu'azzibhu 'azaaban aleemaa

translations.text: Laqad radiyal laahu anil mu'mineena iz yubaayi-'oonaka tahtash shajarati fa'alima maa fee quloobihim fa-anzalas sakeenata alaihim Wa-asaa-bahum fat-han qareebaa

words.en: And spoils of war||much||that they will take||and is||Allah||All-Mighty||All-Wise

translations.text: Wa-maghaanima kaseera-taien yaakhuzoonahaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'Azeezan Hakeemaa

words.id: dan menjanjikan kepadamu||Allah||rampasan perang||banyak||kamu mengambilnya||maka Dia segerakan||bagi kalian||ini||dan Dia menahan||tangan-tangan||manusia||dari kalian||dan agar menjadi||ayat/bukti||bagi orang-orang yang beriman||dan Dia memberi petunjuk kepadamu||jalan||lurus

translations.text: Wa'adakumul laahu ma-ghaanima kaseeratan taakhuzoo-nahaa fa'ajjala lakum haazihee Wa-kaffa aydiyan naasi 'ankum Wa-litakoona aayatal lilmu'mineena Wa-yahdiyakum siraatam mustaqeema

words.en: And others||not||you had power||over them||surely||Allah encompassed||Allah encompassed||them||and is||Allah||over||all||things||All-Powerful

translations.text: Wa-ukhraa lam taqdiroo alaihaa qad ahaatal laahu bihaa; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'in qadeera

words.id: dan sekiranya||memerangi kamu||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||pasti mereka berpaling||belakang||kemudian||tidak||mereka memperoleh||pelindung||dan tidak||penolong
words.en: And if||fight you||those who||disbelieve||surely they would turn||the backs||Then||not||they would find||any protector||and not||any helper

translations.text: Wa-law qaatalakumul lazeena kafaroo la-wallawul adbaara summa laa yajidoona waliyanw-wa laa naseeraa

words.id: ketetapan||Allah||yang||sungguh||telah berlalu||dari||sebelum||dan tidak||kamu mendapatkan||bagi ketetapan||Allah||perobahan/pergantian
words.en: (The established) way||(of) Allah||which||passed away||passed away||before||before||and never||you will find||in (the) way of Allah||in (the) way of Allah||any change

translations.text: Sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat min qablu Wa-lan tajida lisunnatil laahi tabdeelaa

words.id: dan Dia||yang||menahan||tangan-tangan mereka||dari kalian||dan tangan-tanganmu||dari mereka||di tengah||Mekkah||dari||sesudah||bahwa||Dia memenangkan kamu||atas mereka||dan adalah||Allah||dengan||kamu kerjakan||Maha Melihat

translations.text: Wa-Huwal lazee kaffa aydiyahum 'ankum Wa-aydiyakum 'anhum bibatni Makkata mim ba'di an azfarakum alaihim; Wa-kaanal laahu bimaa ta'maloona Baseera

translations.text: Humul lazeena kafaroo Wa-saddookum anil Masjidil Haraami walhadya ma'koofan any yablugha mahillah; Wa-law-laa rijaalum mu'minoona Wa-nisaaa'um mu'minaatul lam ta'lamoohum an tata'oohum fatuseebakum minhum ma'arratum bighairi 'ilm(il) liyud-khilal laahu fee rahmatihee many yashaaa'; law tazayyaloo la'azzabnal lazeena kafaroo minhum 'azaaban aleema

words.id: tatkala||menjadikan/membuat||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dalam||hati mereka||kesombongan||kesombongan||jahiliyah||maka menurunkan||Allah||ketenteraman||atas||rasul-Nya||dan atas||orang-orang yang beriman||dan Dia menetapkan mereka||kalimat||takwa||dan adalah mereka||lebih berhak||dengannya||dan ahlinya||dan adalah||Allah||dengan segala||sesuatu||Maha Mengetahui
words.en: When||had put||those who||disbelieved||in||their hearts||disdain||(the) disdain||(of) the time of ignorance||Then Allah sent down||Then Allah sent down||His tranquility||upon||His Messenger||and upon||the believers||and made them adhere||(to the) word||(of) righteousness||and they were||more deserving||of it||and worthy of it||And is||Allah||of every||thing||All-Knower

translations.text: iz ja'alal lazeena kafaroo fee quloobihimul hamiyyata hamiyyatal jaahiliyyati fa-anzalal laahu sakeenatahoo 'alaa Rasoolihee Wa-'alal mu-mineena Wa-alzamahum kalimatat taqwaa Wa-kaanooo ahaqqa bihaa Wa-ahlahaa; Wa-kaanal laahu bikulli shai'in Aleema

words.en: Certainly||Allah has fulfilled||Allah has fulfilled||His Messenger's||vision||in truth||Surely, you will enter||Al-Masjid||Al-Haraam||if||Allah wills||Allah wills||secure||having shaved||your heads||and shortened||not||fearing||But He knew||what||not||you knew||and He made||besides||besides||that||a victory||near

translations.text: Laqad sadaqal laahu Rasoolahur ru'yaa bilhaqq, latadkhulunnal Masjidal Haraama in shaaa'al laahu aamineena muhalliqeena ru'oosakum Wa-muqassireena laa takhaafoona fa'alima maa lam ta'lamoo faja'ala min dooni zaalika fathan qareebaa

words.id: Dia||yang||mengutus||rasul-Nya||dengan petunjuk||dan agama||benar||karena Dia hendak memenangkannya||atas||agama||semuanya||dan cukup||dengan Allah||saksi
words.en: He||(is) the One Who||(has) sent||His Messenger||with guidance||and (the) religion||the true||that He (may) make it prevail||over||the religions||all||And sufficient is||Allah||(as) a Witness

translations.text: Huwal lazeee arsala Rasoolahoo bilhudaa Wa-deenil haqqi liyuzhirahoo 'alad deeni kullih; Wa-kafaa billaahi Shaheeda

words.id: Muhammad||rasul||Allah||dan orang-orang yang||bersama dia||sangat keras||terhadap||orang-orang kafir||kasih sayang||diantara mereka||kamu melihat mereka||ruku'||sujud||mereka mencari||karunia||dari||Allah||dan keridhaan||tanda-tanda mereka||dalam||muka-muka mereka||dari||bekas||sujud||demikian itu||perumpamaan mereka||dalam||Taurat||dan perumpamaan mereka||dalam||injil||seperti tanaman||ia mengeluarkan||tumbuhnya/tunasnya||maka ia menguatkan||lalu ia menjadi besar||maka ia tegak||atas||batangnya||menakjubkan/menyenangkan||penanam-penanam||karena Dia hendak menjengkelkan||dengan mereka||orang-orang kafir||telah menjanjikan||Allah||orang-orang yang||beriman||dan beramal||kebaikan||dari mereka||ampunan||dan pahala||besar
words.en: Muhammad||(is the) Messenger||of Allah||and those who||(are) with him||(are) firm||against||the disbelievers||and merciful||among themselves||You see them||bowing||and prostrating||seeking||Bounty||from Allah||from Allah||and pleasure||Their mark||(is) on||their faces||from||(the) trace||(of) the prostration||That||(is) their similitude||in||the Taurah||And their similitude||in||the Injeel||(is) like a seed||(which) sends forth||its shoot||then strengthens it||then it becomes thick||and it stands||upon||its stem||delighting||the sowers||that He (may) enrage||by them||the disbelievers||Allah has promised||Allah has promised||those who||believe||and do||righteous deeds||among them||forgiveness||and a reward||great

translations.text: Muhammadur Rasoolul laah; wallazeena ma'ahooo ashiddaaa'u 'alal kuffaaari ruhamaaa'u bainahum taraahum rukka'an sujjadaien yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi Wa-ridwaana seemaahum fee wujoohihim min asaris sujood; zaalika masaluhum fit tawraah; Wa-masaluhum fil injeeli kazar'in akhraja shat-'ahoo fa-'aazarahoo fastaghlaza fastawaa 'alaa sooqihee yu'jibuz zurraa'a liyagheeza bihimul kuffaar; wa'adal laahul lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati minhum maghfiratanw Wa-ajran 'azeemaa
